credit_line: Gift of Sally Israel in memory of Fredericka Steinbach
title: Pendant and Chain
provenance: With bracelet 1996-35-2, belonged to donor's mother, Fredericka Steinbach; purchased by her in New York City in the 1930s.
medium: Silver, moonstone, marcasite, glass or jet
description: Chain of 11 alternating rectangular, half-cylindric blue/grey moonstones with beveled ends, each prong-set in backless silver frame, marcasites near links at each end, open rondelles with marcasite, 6 petal, flower motifs interspersed between stones; long pendant attached to chain end with larger, oblong moonstone prong-set in backless silver frame, open space between prongs and frame on long sides, small baguette-cut black stones set near each prong; pendant frame features open scroll motifs and marcasites; clasp slips into rondelle attached to top of pendant.
name: Necklace
